entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: W 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
